name: Total Management
overview:
Total Management, web-based property management software, was created by property mangers and owners with exclusive features and proprietary technology.

Total Management was created by a team, led by Justin Pearl, CEO and property owner, to fill the void in property management software with a cost-effective cloud-based solution. Total Management includes the necessary tools to manage residential and commercial properties of both large and small scale. Total Management also includes a complete accounting system that is designed around property management.

Markets Served

Residential

Total Management provides you with all of the tools you need including traffic tracking, work orders, tenant portals and more. Commercial

Total Management provides a user interface built specifically for Commercial properties. Users also get fully integrated and easy to use CAM & Tax Reconciliation. Input rent payments for tenants in different properties at the same time. Student Housing

Total Management allows you to move tenants between units with ease. Leases & tenant history are attached to your tenants not your unit. Mixed

Access your different property types in one place without the need for additional modules. Other
